name: nyx_begin_01
text: My purpose is clear, my targets doomed.
text_simple: my purpose is clear my targets doomed

name: nyx_firstblood_02
text: First blood, heheah hah heh! Nyx, Nyx.
text_simple: first blood heheah hah heh nyx nyx

name: nyx_firstblood_03
text: In the name of Nyx, the first assassination is complete!
text_simple: in the name of nyx the first assassination is complete

name: nyx_move_05
text: I have one purpose for being.
text_simple: i have one purpose for being

name: nyx_move_07
text: My words enter the mind, but not the ear.
text_simple: my words enter the mind but not the ear

name: nyx_vendetta_04
text: You can't run from your thoughts.
text_simple: you cant run from your thoughts

name: nyx_failure_05
text: I failed you, Nyx, I was so close.
text_simple: i failed you nyx i was so close

name: nyx_levelup_01
text: The better to kill them with.
text_simple: the better to kill them with

name: nyx_levelup_05
text: I am the pride of Nyx.
text_simple: i am the pride of nyx

name: nyx_kill_02
text: Ahaha, another body laid to waste.
text_simple: ahaha another body laid to waste

name: nyx_kill_06
text: You are as dead as they come.
text_simple: you are as dead as they come

name: nyx_kill_08
text: Go the way of all flesh.
text_simple: go the way of all flesh

name: nyx_kill_09
text: I hear your thoughts no more.
text_simple: i hear your thoughts no more

name: nyx_kill_15
text: Heheahah ahaha haha, Nyx, Nyx, Nyx.
text_simple: heheahah ahaha haha nyx nyx nyx

name: nyx_kill_16
text: For you, dear Nyx, for you.
text_simple: for you dear nyx for you

name: nyx_kill_17
text: Nyx, Nyx, Nyx, heh heh hah.
text_simple: nyx nyx nyx heh heh hah

name: nyx_rival_01
text: Neither hot, nor cold, just dead.
text_simple: neither hot nor cold just dead

name: nyx_rival_02
text: I silence one voice, then the other.
text_simple: i silence one voice then the other

name: nyx_rival_04
text: Your metamorphosis was impressive, I will admit.
text_simple: your metamorphosis was impressive i will admit

name: nyx_rival_06
text: Not an easy bug to kill, but worth the effort.
text_simple: not an easy bug to kill but worth the effort

name: nyx_rival_07
text: Caught in your own web, ahe.
text_simple: caught in your own web ahe

name: nyx_rival_10
text: Your exoskeleton was no match for Nyx.
text_simple: your exoskeleton was no match for nyx

name: nyx_rival_11
text: The ogre and his parasite are no more.
text_simple: the ogre and his parasite are no more

name: nyx_rival_13
text: The stealth assassin, not stealthy enough.
text_simple: the stealth assassin not stealthy enough

name: nyx_rival_14
text: Your books couldn't save you, Warlock.
text_simple: your books couldnt save you warlock

name: nyx_rival_15
text: Ah, the insects can feast on your corpse.
text_simple: ah the insects can feast on your corpse

name: nyx_rival_16
text: It seems the insects have been eating you for some time already.
text_simple: it seems the insects have been eating you for some time already

name: nyx_rival_17
text: Your life without end comes to an end.
text_simple: your life without end comes to an end

name: nyx_rival_20
text: Hehehe, you fought well, for a keen.
text_simple: hehehe you fought well for a keen

name: nyx_rival_21
text: Hahahaha! Your books couldn't save you.
text_simple: hahahaha your books couldnt save you

name: nyx_rival_22
text: May the silverfish devour your books.
text_simple: may the silverfish devour your books

name: nyx_rival_27
text: I despised you since the birth of my whole entire caste.
text_simple: i despised you since the birth of my whole entire caste

name: nyx_ally_01
text: Come, we will spin them into death, Broodmother.

text: Earth shall shake, I shall kill.

name: nyx_death_07
text: Another will rise in my place.
text_simple: another will rise in my place

name: nyx_death_09
text: With my last thought, I curse you.
text_simple: with my last thought i curse you

name: nyx_death_13
text: I have failed the goddess Nyx.
text_simple: i have failed the goddess nyx

text: The ogre and his parasite slay me.
text_simple: the ogre and his parasite slay me

text: Write my name in the book of the dead.

name: nyx_death_18
text: I am Nyx, grakillaaghraamghiah! Oi-grayoighaaah... Nyx-aaaagh...
text_simple: i am nyx grakillaaghraamghiah oigrayoighaaah nyxaaaagh

name: nyx_respawn_01
text: It's always darkest before the spawn.
text_simple: its always darkest before the spawn

name: nyx_respawn_03
text: My thoughts cohere from the ether.
text_simple: my thoughts cohere from the ether

name: nyx_respawn_11
text: The chosen of Nyx knows not failure.
text_simple: the chosen of nyx knows not failure

name: nyx_respawn_12
text: There is always a Nyx assassin.
text_simple: there is always a nyx assassin

name: nyx_respawn_13
text: The new Nyx assassin is risen.
text_simple: the new nyx assassin is risen

name: nyx_rare_01
text: Armorless beings were not meant for life.
text_simple: armorless beings were not meant for life

name: nyx_rare_02
text: Many are the soldiers, workers and reproductives of my colony. But I am the fourth caste. The assassin caste. The caste of one.
text_simple: many are the soldiers workers and reproductives of my colony but i am the fourth caste the assassin caste the caste of one

name: nyx_rare_06
text: I could have been a lowly grub, but by the grace of our goddess Nyx, I have been elevated to the highest state. Nor shall I disappoint her.
text_simple: i could have been a lowly grub but by the grace of our goddess nyx i have been elevated to the highest state nor shall i disappoint her

name: nyx_rare_04
text: The blessing of Nyx gives me all the purpose I require.
text_simple: the blessing of nyx gives me all the purpose i require

name: nyx_rare_05
text: It is not my fault. The armorless were not meant for life. Look at them.
text_simple: it is not my fault the armorless were not meant for life look at them

name: nyx_purch_03
text: Th, a tool of the trade.
text_simple: th a tool of the trade

name: nyx_scepter_01
text: Long has this been in my thoughts.
text_simple: long has this been in my thoughts

name: nyx_deny_11

text: Oh, they're going to hate this.

name: nyx_illus_02
text: We all look alike to you.
text_simple: we all look alike to you

name: nyx_inthebag_01
text: As the chosen assassin of the greatest goddess Nyx, I can promise you that this one's in the bag.
text_simple: as the chosen assassin of the greatest goddess nyx i can promise you that this ones in the bag

text: Nyx has no use for me now.
